findings.message:
SafeGiftTokens.withdrawnTokens (0xd8c91afa243a3e40b0a3d2d80d81bec4f1e7fe2c.sol#131-145) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-ERC20Interface(tokenErc20).transfer(_to,balanceErc20) (0xd8c91afa243a3e40b0a3d2d80d81bec4f1e7fe2c.sol)
findings.name: unused-return

findings.message:
SafeGiftTokens.transferFrom.allowance (local variable @ 0xd8c91afa243a3e40b0a3d2d80d81bec4f1e7fe2c.sol#81) shadows:
	- SafeGiftTokens.allowance (function @ 0xd8c91afa243a3e40b0a3d2d80d81bec4f1e7fe2c.sol#100-108)
findings.name: shadowing-local

findings.message:
SafeGiftTokens.promo has external calls inside a loop:
	- _recipients[i].transfer(7777777777) (0xd8c91afa243a3e40b0a3d2d80d81bec4f1e7fe2c.sol#113)
findings.name: calls-loop

findings.message:

findings.name: calls-loop
